name: Be-Yond
overview: Monstrous aliens are attacking a skyscraper area in a modern city on the Earth. A special battleship, navigated by captain Eve Bloodymary and second-in-command Rose Daiquiri, is sent to deal with the threat. At the same time, the protagonist of the game awakens in a dark room. He remembers nothing but his name (default: Kojuurou), and a short scene: skyscraper, an alien approaching - darkness... Before long he meets a mysterious girl named Ren, who for some reason calls him "Master"... Is this a new threat to the human race? Or is Kojuurou's own nature changing?... Be-Yond is a Japanese-style adventure with an icon-based interface. At every given screen,m there is a set of commands: Look, Talk, Think, Discuss, and Go (sometimes with sub-menus). Usually, the story advances when all of the commands have been used several times. At certain points there are also dialogue options and choices of action. The game features nudity and sexual content.
